version_description:
Optimization of work with the server
Bugfixes
Localization fixes

Optimization of work with the server
Bugfixes
Localization fixes

Optimization of work with the server
Bugfixes
Localization fixes

Completely new interface, more beautiful and convenient.
Possibility to fasten an item in inventory.
Sorting items in inventory and locations by name, quantity or weight.
Rebalance, small changes in skills and recipes.
Changed the chat in online mode. Channels "General", "Trading", "Personal" have been added.
Advanced parcel receiving interface.
Skill books immediately open the next level.
Changed tutorial and starting city.

Completely new interface, more beautiful and convenient.
Possibility to fasten an item in inventory.
Sorting items in inventory and locations by name, quantity or weight.
Rebalance, small changes in skills and recipes.
Changed the chat in online mode. Channels "General", "Trading", "Personal" have been added.
Advanced parcel receiving interface.
Skill books immediately open the next level.
Changed tutorial and starting city.

Quests bugs fixed
Coupon bug fixed
Minor bugs fixed
Increased buttons size on main screen
Designs in closed skill levels can be readed

New fuel gauge
New watches
Improved interface style
New Item: Shchi
Fixing bugs

New fuel gauge
New watches
Improved interface style

Fixing bugs

Fixing bugs

A completely redesigned map
Several new items and recipes
Balance changes
Interface enhancements
Fixing bugs
Fixing bugs

New appearance of cities
Improved location interface
Improved balance of skill levels
Good New Year spirit
Fixing bugs

Added carcasses of radioactive animals and contaminated meat
Added the ability to lock any number of items in the inventory
Added a drying rack with the ability to dry meat and fish
Added notification icon for new message in private chat
Removed Christmas decorations
Fixing bugs
Fixing bugs

Reduced the amount of metal required to create armor and bowlers
Fixed bug with inability to read the whole text of the quest in tutorial
Added a new save point near the town of Mirny (Yakutia)
Character Vladimir (quest for BelAZ) moved out of the city to a new save point
Fixing bugs

Optimize for the iPhone X
Fixing bugs

Changed character icon
Added items: Strange TV, Bee carcass, Eagle carcass, Acid gland, Black Volga
Added rewarded video ads
In the premium version, periodic advertising is disabled, in the free version, the award is removed
Daily awards added
Added setting: Марк looted locations
Fixing bugs
Fixing bugs
Fixing bugs

First aid kit replaces Alphacelone in shop
Optimization of application size
Fixing bugs
Fixing bugs
Fixing bugs

The plot of the game is completely redesigned and expanded, new tasks and characters added
Premium status can now be purchased from the store
Added new gas masks, flashlights and other items
The system of diseases and injuries has been reworked, now the treatment blocks the damage
Changed city icons
The radiation level in the locations is visible without the geiger counter
Changed game balance
The number of searches in one location has been reduced
Search in night time is now possible only with light sources
New weather added 'Northern Lights'
Experience boosters in the store became twice as cheap
Category 'Base' in the store is replaced with 'Resources'

The plot of the game is completely redesigned and expanded, new tasks and characters added
Premium status can now be purchased from the store
Added new gas masks, flashlights and other items
The system of diseases and injuries has been reworked, now the treatment blocks the damage
Changed city icons
The radiation level in the locations is visible without the geiger counter
Changed game balance
The number of searches in one location has been reduced
Search in night time is now possible only with light sources
New weather added 'Northern Lights'
Experience boosters in the store became twice as cheap
Category 'Base' in the store is replaced with 'Resources'
Fixing bugs

Fixed a bug with missing items
Fixed a bug with hunting on the go
Fixed bug with rags bandage
Sugar added to shop
Some bugs fixed

Pet system added
Added the ability to return items lost after new deaths
Reduced store prices
New Year items and enemies added
Starter kit returned to premium
Raven pet added for premium players
Some bugs fixed

Global survival update
New searching system
New character development system
New cooking System
New map and interface design
Some bugs fixed

The wolf helps in battle again
Added painkillers, temporarily turns off the negative effects of injuries
Added several new objects for the battlefield map. Most maps updated
Many small but very useful changes in the combat system
"Wear and tear" indicator changed to "Durability"
Some bugs fixed

Fixed daily reward bug
Fixed a bug with the definition of language

Improved protection against hacking
Fixed bug with Strange TV
Balanced difficulty in Sandbox mode
Improved rewarded advertising
Disable forced advertising

Fixed localization of some cities
It is impossible to cause a fire in open locations (courtyard, checkpoint, parade ground)
Fixed bug with loading at 90%
Some minor bugs fixed
Fixing bugs
Fixing bugs

Added new combat system
Completely changed the basic parameters of the character
Completely changed the start tutorial
Added new firearms
Added new transport
Added herbs and berries instead of mushrooms
Minor schematic changes
Added interfaces for the gathering wood and water
Removed many obsolete items
Instead of deleted items, you will receive an equivalent replacement

New Year's Event is over
Fried chanterelles added
Assembling ZAZ-968 no longer requires a welding machine
Some optimization has been done
Some bugs fixed

The wolf helps in battle again
Added painkillers, temporarily turns off the negative effects of injuries
Added several new objects for the battlefield map. Most maps updated
Many small but very useful changes in the combat system
"Wear and tear" indicator changed to "Durability"
Some bugs fixed

Now you can change your name for online-mode in settings
Many server-side changes for online-mode
Some bugs fixed
Some bugs fixed

Global survival update
New searching system
New character development system
New cooking System
New map and interface design

Steel smelting requires 1000 coal instead of 5000
Steel tool strength increased to 500
Belaz requires 50.000 steel instead of 100.000
Some perks significantly enhanced
Reduced time to craft items in large quantities
Added 8 new shelters
Added experience to most schemes
New icons on the global map with the ability to filter
Constructed houses remove radiation from the camp
Less tool durability points are spent on opening locks
Some bugs fixed

Halloween event added
Planting greenhouses moved to seeds
Some bugs fixed
Fix translation issues

Christmas event is over
Increased damage to standart and improved crossbows
Hand injury in combat now doubles weapon wear
Body Injury in combat now reduces the maximum number of AP by 2
Mines on the battlefield are now always visible
Flying creatures do not activate traps on the battlefield
Resting in a bunkhouse also restores the pets parameters
Some bugs fixed

All traders on the survivor bases are changed, new ones are added
Added experience for opening doors
Balance changes

Weather animations added
Heavy crossbow moved to level 53
Gathering firewood with your hands takes energy
Added clear button in the hotbar menu
Added pet experience for executing commands
Complicated creation and repair of ghillie suit
Mines are again invisible, but their damage is reduced
Some bugs fixed
Fixing bugs

Changes made to the beginning of the game to Murmansk
New perks added: Poisoner, Steelmaker, Moonshiner, Truck
The torch can be used as a weapon
Changed global map image
All bandit and looter icons changed
Some bugs fixed
Some bugs fixed

Moving in battle does not spend action points
Changed ranks of some perks
Added new town Pusnoy between Murmansk and Olenegorsk
Reduced machine gun ammo waste
Added string to get experience

Daily quests
Enemies threat level added
Updated battle interface
Updated battlefield maps
Added new battlefield objects
Updated shop interface
Added patrols for bandit bases in cities
Increased GAZ-66 capacity
